about_the_game:
Perennial Order Original Soundtrack | Composed by Julian Crowhurst

Purchasing the Perennial Order Original Soundtrack is a great way to directly support the developers of this game, Gardenfiend Games!



The original orchestral soundtrack for Perennial Order accompanies you along your journey through our hauntingly beautiful world.

Experience the intensity of our epic bosses, the eeriness of traversing the wilderness, or the momentary sense of comfort in a safe haven.

Contains the full soundtrack in MP3 format. High-quality FLAC and Ogg Vorbis versions available by opting into the "Download high quality audio files" setting in your Steam Settings > Music tab.

BONUS: Includes an extra folder of the in-game Notebook Entry art in 1920x1080 resolution for use as desktop backgrounds!

If you enjoyed your time playing our game and listening to the music, please consider buying the soundtrack! Thank you.
